summary: The MkDocs AI update log highlights core improvements such as unified cache architecture, enhanced CI/CD support, and intelligent platform recognition. Version 1.2.0 introduces multiple AI service support, adaptive environments, and intelligent caching. Technical enhancements include unified API interfaces, improved error handling, and performance optimizations. The initial version, 1.0.0, featured AI summarization, reading time statistics, basic caching, and configuration options. Planned features include additional AI service support, secure API key handling, batch processing mode, data export, and web interface configuration.
page_title: MkDocs AI 摘要更新日志
